text: 18.25 Apo 19.3, Lom 12.11 Apolos ne God wog golɨgup anɨb ak, bɨ ogɨnap nop ned agñɨlak. Gos ne won ak kɨles tɨmel gɨl nɨŋɨd, binɨb anɨb okok kɨlop takaw agñin agɨl gos nɨgak. Ak nɨm, Apolos ne Jisas takaw nokom nokom binɨb okok kɨlop yɨpɨd gɨl yɨbɨl agak. Takaw agak anɨb ak, Jon Bɨ Ñɨg Pakñeb nɨgak tek nep nɨŋɨd anɨb agak.
